title: cannot connect to pvp.net
body: I reformatted my computer, I flushed dns, I restarted modem and router many of times, i input the 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4, I re-installed league, I tried both legacy and new client + repair, I have done it all. Please rito.

replies.body: Repairing can help resolve issues with game files, but not really connection which may be for this case.  Instead, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possible issues with your network.  Go through each step and let me know the results.
